Box1.Body: You were sucked into the box! Welcome to the magician's initiation ceremony!

Box_Strength1.Body: A slime appears in front of you. When you defeated the slime, you feel your strength increase! It also dropped a gem with a letter engraved inside. . . w?

Box_Strength2.Body: What appeared this time were 3 dwarf goblins. Although the opponent had a numerical advantage, you still defeated them with your enhanced strength. This time the loot is a gem engraved with 'a'.

Box_Strength3.Body: This time a strong werewolf appeared. After a hard fight, you finally beat it into a weredog. Pick up the gem it dropped. The letter 'o' glows faintly in the center of the gem.

Final.Body: Congratulations, you are now an extraordinary magician! Now, use your power to defend the world!

Box_Speed1.Body: In the single-plank bridge trial, you closed your eyes and ran quickly. As you ran, you heard the bridge behind you begin to break. Finally reaching the end, a gem with the word 'i' floating at the end. You feel your strength return and your speed and reflexes improve.

Box_Speed2.Body: Walls full of holes appear on all sides to surround you. Then arrows start to spray from the small hole, and you hide and hide in a panic. A gem with the word 'n' falls from the sky. With the appearance of the gem, your speed increase again.

Box_Speed3.Body: I believe you also have a premonition. That's right! This time it's a single-plank bridge + hidden weapon sneak attack! With no danger, you finally come to the end of the passage. Another gem with the word 'i' automatically flies into your hand.

HiddenLevel.Body: Child, this is a gift from your father. Do you like it? I hope you and your mother are well. I am sorry that I may not have fulfilled my responsibilities as a father, but I still want to tell you and my wife that I love you! (woaini)
